nodes.text: The Enigma was a starship that served the Galactic Empire during the government rule. After receiving prime marks at Carida Academy, Tian Karmiya, who eventually became a commander within the Imperial Navy, further bolstered her reputation with her fine service aboard the Enigma before later serving on the starship Victory at Batonn and the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Ultimatum by 3 ABY.
The Enigma was mentioned in the short story "The Final Order," which was written by Seth Dickinson as part of the 2020 short story collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
